description.value:
You throw this tab of compacted black powder to the ground and it ignites, releasing a cloud of foul-smelling smoke.

Level: 10
Category: Alchemical Item
Time: 30 min.
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 800 gp
Key Skill: Arcana or Nature

Utility Power (Zone) âœ¦ Consumable (Standard Action)

Effect: Area burst 1 within 10. The burst creates a zone of lightly obscured squares that lasts until the end of the encounter.



Published in Mordenkainen's Magnificent Emporium, page(s) 134.
